As a result, the animal gods became angry and attacked the encampment.  \n  \nInto this conflict wanders a young boy, Ashitaka, a refugee of the Emishi people. His people still live in hiding, but when his village was attacked, he shot and killed one of the animal gods. For this he has been given the curse of death.  \n  \nHe has begun a search through Japan to find the secret of his curse when he arrives at the encampment. Outside of the encampment he is attacked by the \"Monster Princess\", a girl raised in the woods by Moro no Kimi (a 300 year old female dog god) and who is driven by a fierce hatred for the humans who are destroying the forest. This girl, San, has repeatedly attacked the encampment, but after she meets Ashitaka, she becomes torn between her loyalty to the animal-gods and the world of the humans.  \nSurrounded by the warring characters of the humans on one side and the animal-gods on the other, each side believing in the righteouness of its cause, it is Ashitaka and San who must face each other personally and, by the end of the film, come to an understanding of each other's world and make the attempt to coexist without hatred and violence.  \n  \nNot far from the heart of the sacred forest where the great Deer God dwells, a new town called Irontown is founded. Conflict seems inevitable.  \n  \nA young girl raised by wolves, and a warrior bearing a curse inflicted by the hatred of a dying Boar God are trying to make things right. Physically.\"\r\n\r\nTo Siwoo, strength isn't something he's had to train for, but something that's come naturally. When he turned sixteen years old though, the world undergoes a catastrophic change. He's more special than anyone! The herculean Siwoo's dungeon run begins now!\r\n\r\n---\r\n26-year-old Jung Si-woo never had any friends, because there was nothing interesting about him. He lived an average life as an average person in an average world. But suddenly, the earth faced a great change when Mysterious floating 'Sky Castles' appeared. The 'Sky Castles' granted some people wings and powers, but unfortunately, Si-woo wasn't one of them.\r\n\r\n---\r\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EB%A1%9C%EA%B7%B8%EC%9D%B8/2366), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/54269969)\r\n\r\n**Official Translations:**\r\n* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/154), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-log-in-alone), [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc677)","ja":"\"俺が出ると残り全員が補欠になっちゃうんだよ。物理的に。\" 11歳の「青井翔太」は体育の時間になると、いつも一人ぼっちだった。 「翔太」にとって「力」とは、鍛え上げるものではなく、持って生まれるもの！ 彼が16歳になったとき、地球の上空に謎の巨大城と、 プレイヤーと呼ばれる翼を持った人たちが現れる。 それから10年が経ち…。 超人的な力に恵まれながらも、プレイヤーになれずプータロー生活を満喫していた 「翔太」は、空から落ちてきた池田美羽を助けようとしたところ、地下ダンジョンに落ち、地下プレイヤーとして目覚めるが…。 ”俺は誰よりも特別だぜ！” 世界をひっくり返すほど痛快な翔太のダンジョン攻略が始まる！\r\n\r\n---\r\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EB%A1%9C%EA%B7%B8%EC%9D%B8/2366), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/54269969)\r\n\r\n**Official Translations:**\r\n* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/154), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-log-in-alone), [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc677)\r\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Solo-Login/14)\r\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/28829)\r\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Solo_Login/207)","ko":"11살 정시우는 항상 체육 시간에 혼자 노는 수밖에 없었다.\r\n“난 구기 열외야.”\r\n“왜 너만 열외야? Camellia was just 12 when she was taken away from her mother in the slums and forced to live as the son of an aristocratic family. But under the layers of secrets and lies, she never forgets. She continues to struggle to be her true self again, to reclaim the life of Camellia.\n\n---\nCamellia was a flower born of a street rat, her face more ethereal than any other. When she was a child, a wealthy noblewoman took her and forced her to become Camellius Bale, the second-born son of House Bale. From that day on, her life was no longer her own.\n\nFor years, Camellius has lived to protect the position of her older brother, Kieran, even though this does not benefit her at all. With nowhere to run, she obeys her stepmother's orders, burying herself deep beneath a facade of lies. As she begins to cross paths with Claude del Ihar, the heir to the grand dukedom, she continues to hope that someday she can reclaim what was once hers—the life of Camellia.","es":"Su vida no era más que una mentira.\n\nCamelia tenía solo 12 años cuando la separaron de su madre en los barrios marginales y la obligaron a vivir como hija de una familia aristocrática. 686493ae-b7e6-4a12-96f3-c8c7436d5beb:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"686493ae-b7e6-4a12-96f3-c8c7436d5beb","title":{"en":"A Twist of Fate: A Wizard's Fairy Tale"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"마법사를 위한 동화"},{"ko-ro":"Mabeobsareul Wihan Donghwa"},{"en":"A Fairytale for Wizards"},{"en":"Fairytale for Wizards"},{"ja":"魔法使いのための童話"},{"ja-ro":"Mahoutsukai no Tame no Douwa"},{"th":"จอมเวทปาฏิหาริย์กับนิทานแห่งมนตรา"},{"es":"Un cuento de hada para magos"}],"relatedIds":["32bc225c-5026-4441-bd15-ed357a63440d"],"description":{"en":"A young girl was neglected by her parents due to the belief that twins were bad luck to the point that she wasn't given a name. After losing her family and a few years of her memory, she was living an unfortunate life as a slave to a count's family.  Then one day, a beautiful wizard who was called the strongest wizard in the world appeared before her eyes. The truth about her hidden past gradually comes to light. Their meeting will drastically change the fate of the world!\n\n---\nWith a status of a slave, Azrael has served a noble’s whipping child. In this misery, one mysterious man comes into her life.\n\n“Why are you living a life like this?”\n“Do you know me?”\n\nIn the three years of her life she’s forgotten, the one who gave her a name was the Wizard of the Horizon, Rhema Resht. His kindness yet lacking something, caught her attention. She wanted him to be as happy as she was.\n\n“The more you get to know me, misfortune will come.”\n“I promise I won’t be miserable, Rhema. So, please teach me magic.”\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8043), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/58974724)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7534)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.comico.jp/comic/7534)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/2863)"},"links":{"al":"158598","ap":"a-twist-of-fate-a-wizards-fairy-tale","engtl":"https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7534","mu":"doxti2g","nu":"a-fairytale-for-wizards","raw":"https://www.comico.kr/comic/8043"},"originalLanguage":"ko","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Ли Со выживает в одиночку, не желая видеть, как его товарищи погибают один за другим. Он выходит из комы ровно тогда, когда случается официальный релиз игры. Полностью восстановив своё физическое состояние, он снова входит в игру со своим существующим персонажем и полон решимости использовать все, что у него есть, дабы выжать из игры максимум и разбогатеть.\r\n\r\n---\r\n- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30285)\r\n\r\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.comico.jp/articleList.nhn?titleNo=32094)\r\n---\r\n- [Original Webtoon \u003ckakao\u003e](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58069514)","zh":"李瑞宇成为了世界第一个幻想游戏的测试员，但却因为不完善的游戏系统参与人员无法退出，就当其他参加人员都在游戏中死亡之后只有他一人独自活了下来。当游戏的正式版本上线之后，从混乱中逃离的李瑞宇恢复体力后又立即参加了新的游戏...“期待吧，我将竭尽全力闯到最后成为最厉害的富者！”\r\n\r\n---\r\n- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30285)\r\n\r\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.comico.jp/articleList.nhn?titleNo=32094)\r\n---\r\n- [Original Webtoon \u003ckakao\u003e](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58069514)"},"links":{"ap":"my-levels-the-best","engtl":"https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/288","mu":"178267","raw":"https://www.comico.kr/comic/288"},"originalLanguage":"ko","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"8c86611e-fab7-4986-9dec-d1a2f44acdd5","name":{"en":"Virtual Reality"}},{"id":"9438db5a-7e2a-4ac0-b39e-e0d95a34b8a8","name":{"en":"Video Games"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

69a7cd43-b204-4aff-8351-1146136c811c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"69a7cd43-b204-4aff-8351-1146136c811c","title":{"en":"Yakeppachi's Maria"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"やけっぱちのマリア"},{"ja-ro":"Yakeppachi no Maria"}],"lastChapter":"12","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["e743e1fb-7909-4029-a87a-672d85593704"],"description":{"en":"Teenage delinquent Yaketpachi's has a spectral woman as the closest thing to a female influence in his life: Maria! The manifestation of the women Yaketpachi lacks in his life, Maria needs a body to become corporeal, but the only thing around is a sex doll, which is easily ravaged by a hard life and the target of rough pranks. Yaketpachi and Maria are joined at the soul, but ripped apart by an uncaring society. How much strain can Maria's plastic body take before it cracks beyond repair? Yaketpachi may want to move heaven and Earth to provide a life for Maria, but do teenagers truly know love?Osamu Tezuka brings the battle of the sexes to a paranormal comedy, where Yaketpachi and Maria explore their teenage years in High School, with all the trials and tribulations that come with it. There's the queen bee of the school to tussle with, a dating club that heavily skews towards one gender (and against Yaketpachi), and even rival spirits out to earn their own revenge against their accidental deaths! Yaketpachi's Maria continues to prove to be a love letter to young love, with all the faults and flaws that are inherent. Tezuka brings a healthy dose of real-world sexual education to the drama of a love that can never be between a man and his sex doll.\n\n---\n**Volumes 268 and 269 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**"},"links":{"al":"81131","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B074CKBTGC?binding=kindle_edition\u0026ref_=dbs_s_ks_series_rwt_tkin\u0026qid=1662352509\u0026sr=1-3","ap":"yaketpachis-maria","bw":"series/221188/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2356521","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/314273/","kt":"9163","mal":"51131","mu":"66645","raw":"https://www.fukkan.com/fk/CartSearchDetail?i_no=68327056"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3bb26d85-09d5-4d2e-880c-c34b974339e9","name":{"en":"Ghosts"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

Alheio a eles, o jovem universitário Ken Kaneki leva uma vida pacata entre livros, até que um trágico encontro o coloca diante desses seres e o obriga a lutar por sua humanidade.","ru":"Раса гулей существует с незапамятных времен. Ее представители вовсе не против людей, они их даже любят - преимущественно в сыром виде. Любители человечины внешне неотличимы от нас, сильны, быстры и живучи - но их мало, потому гули выработали строгие правила охоты и маскировки, а нарушителей наказывают сами или по-тихому сдают борцам с нечистью. В век науки люди знают про гулей, но как говорится, привыкли. Власти не считают людоедов угрозой, более того, рассматривают их как идеальную основу для создания суперсолдат. Эксперименты идут уже давно…  \n  \nНичего этого не ведал Канэки Кэн, робкий и невзрачный токийский первокурсник, безнадежно влюбленный в красавицу-интеллектуалку Ризэ, частую гостью в кафе «Место встречи», где парень подрабатывает официантом. Не думал Кэн, что скоро самому придется стать гулем, и многие знакомые предстанут в неожиданном свете. Главному герою предстоит мучительный поиск нового пути, ибо он понял, что люди и гули похожи: просто одни друг друга жрут в прямом смысле, другие - в переносном. Правда жизни жестока, переделать ее нельзя, и силен тот, кто не отворачивается. А дальше уж как-нибудь!"},"links":{"al":"63327","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B07571DCTF/","ap":"tokyo-ghoul","bw":"series/12565/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/174045/","engtl":"https://www.viz.com/read/manga/tokyo-ghoul/all","kt":"tokyo-ghoul-m","mal":"33327","mu":"70001","raw":"https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/13932016480028833022"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

El país de los cerezos"},{"vi":"Phố chiều lặng gió Mênh mang anh đào"},{"pt-br":"Hiroshima - A Cidade da Calmaria"},{"ru":"Город вечернего затишья, страна вишнёвого цвета"},{"ja":"夕凪の街 桜の国"},{"fr":"Le pays de cerisiers"}],"lastChapter":"3","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","ar"],"relatedIdds":["afa174ba-4095-46ea-901e-8e7ca686a10d"],"description":{"en":"Part 1: Hiroshima, 1955. Ten years after the city was consumed by a scorching flash of light, a woman's soul is still deeply shaken by the earth-shattering explosion that devastated her home and changed her life forever. A family from Hiroshima struggles to come to terms with their survival of the atomic bombing of their city. The protagonist is Minami Hirano, about 20 years of age.  \n  \nPart 2: Set some decades later, the niece of Minami Hirano is bewildered by her father's mysterious disappearances. She and a friend follow him to discover what he is doing.  \n  \nThe main theme of this historic manga concerns the question of what impact the war and the atomic bombing had on the most vulnerable. Fumiyo Kôno examines this question in her outstanding book - an award-winning, widely-discussed masterpiece.  \n\n---\n- **Won the Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize in 2004** \n- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Creative Award in 2005**"},"links":{"al":"31487","amz":"https://www.amazon.com/dp/4575297445","ap":"town-of-evening-calm-country-of-cherry-blossoms","bw":"series/311603","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-290371","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/648871/","engtl":"https://www.amazon.com/dp/0867197218","kt":"3166","mal":"1487","mu":"1575"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

Desir Arman, einer der sechs Überlebenden der Menschheit, befindet sich im Labyrinth. Die sechs versuchen gemeinsam, die letzte Prüfung des Labyrinths zu meistern, scheitern aber, woraufhin die Welt untergeht. Aber als sich Desir gerade auf sein Ende vorbereitet, erscheint plötzlich vor ihm die Welt … von vor 13 Jahren?! Desir ist in die Vergangenheit zurückgekehrt, in eine Zeit, als er Schüler an der besten Magierschule seines war. Er und seine Liebsten wurden wieder vereint, und er ist entschlossen, dieses Mal sie und die Welt zu retten! Es bleiben noch drei Jahre bevor die Schattenwelt erscheint! 돌아온 이상, 사랑하는 사람들을 두 번 잃을 순 없어!\"\r\n\r\n인류가 맞이한 최악의 재앙, 그림자 미궁.\r\n데지르 아르망은 미궁 속에서 \r\n마지막까지 살아남은 최후의 생존자 6명 중 한 명이다.\r\n그들은 그림자 미궁의 마지막 단계에 도전하지만 결국 실패하고\r\n세계는 멸망을 맞이하고 만다.\r\n\r\n모든 게 끝이라 생각했던 순간,\r\n데지르의 눈앞에 펼쳐진 것은 다름 아닌 13년 전의 세상?!\r\n\r\n제국 최고의 마법 학원, 헤브리온에 입학했던 순간으로 돌아온 데지르.\r\n그림자 미궁에서 잃었던 소중한 사람들과 재회하게 되고,\r\n사랑하는 사람들과 세상을 구하기 위해 과거를 바꾸고자 하는데…!\r\n\r\n그림자 세계 발생까지 남은 시간은 3년!\r\n과거를 когда я вернулся, я не позволю дорогим для меня людям снова умереть\".\r\nЛабиринт Теней – главная катастрофа для человечества за всю историю его существования.\r\nДезир Арман – один из шести выживших людей.\r\n\r\nШесть попыток зачистить последний уровень лабиринта потерпели полную неудачу, и теперь мир близится к концу.\r\nОднако, когда Дезир готовится встретить свою кончину, то, что открывается перед ним – это мир... 13 лет назад?!\r\n\r\nДезир возвращается в прошлое, когда он только поступил в самую престижную магическую академию магии в стране – Хаврион. Он вновь воссоединился со своими дорогими друзьями и готов изменить прошлое, чтобы спасти этот мир и тех, кто ему дорог.\r\n\r\nОстались три года до появления Теневого Мира!
